Subtitle: Brand new unworn, full warranty, MSRP 328,000 overnight
Description: Today, we are offering a brand new and unworn Limited Edition Roger Dubuis Excalibur Skeleton Double Flying Tourbillon 18kt Rose Gold Case Men's Watch Ref. RDDBEX0283 with all box and paper as received from our retailer (full retail and factory warranty included dated as of the day of successful end of sale). This is a genuine Roger Dubuis watch and we guarantee authenticity. This is the last piece that is available anywhere in the world from an authorized Roger-Dubuis retailer. Any other offers that you see online are from non-authorized sources. The watch comes with the original Roger Dubuis Alligator strap with inserts and with the original Roger Dubuis folding buckle. Everything in this auction is exactly the way you get it from the authorized Roger-Dubuis retailer as we sourced it from an authorized retailer. All papers, boxes, tags etc. are included. The watch comes with full warranty. PLEASE NOTE: UNLIKE CHEAPER OFFERS THIS WARRANTY IS AN AUTHORIZED RETAIL WARRANTY WITH FULL INTERNATIONAL VALIDITY. The current retail price for this watch is $328,000. We are offering it today considerably below wholesale pricing. The watch is brand new and unworn and free from any blemishes. It still comes with all the factory wraps, seals and covers and was never on display. This watch is sourced straight from the factory. The flawless condition of the watch can be seen in the pictures. The watch runs perfectly fine to specifications. Description: 45mm 18k rose gold case with black rubber on bezel and crown. It has a charcoal flange, a white minute-circle and Roger Dubuis transfers. The movement can be viewed through the sapphire crystal display back. It sits on a black Mississippi alligator strap and has an 18k rose gold deployant buckle. This is the last limited edition available. All sales are final, you can bid with confidence as the watch shown in the pictures is the actual watch up for auction. We guarantee authenticity and accurate representation. Any material deviation from any of these representations entitles the successful bidder to a return of the watch. We also include free shipping with FedEx to addresses in the continental U.S. as well as low rate 2nd day and overnight express options and international shipping at affordable rates. For insurance reasons we can only ship to the buyer's verified PayPal address. For any shipping or handling issues both domestic and international, please contact us prior to bidding. As a fairness to other bidders and in accordance with eBay policies, please note that the watch will be automatically relisted if payment is not received within 48 hours after the successful end of the auction. Thank you for your understanding. We do accept wire transfers, certified funds and credit card payments as well. For further questions, please never hesitate to contact us. Title: Limited Edition Roger Dubuis Excalibur Skeleton Double Flying Tourbillon NEW
